sentences: Eric Lau is a British music producer and DJ from London, England.
He released his debut album "New Territories" in 2008 on Ubiquity Records to critical acclaim.
"After a two-year absence Lau returned in 2010 with a new EP titled "Kilawatt: V2", as the second instalment of the producer series released by Kilawatt.
In November 2011, Lau released "The Mission - Single" with Detroit rapper Guilty Simpson and Georgia Anne Muldrow contributing a remix.
On 3 February 2012, Lau released the much anticipated "The Mission - EP", featuring vocals from rapper Guilty Simpson, Fatima and Olivier Daysoul.
